emuInput.TitMainTitle: Duquesne University baseball team player no. 36 Dick Ricketts, in base running pose on field
emuInput.CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, April 16, 1955, pg. 23, reads: "Back Again - As if Dave and Dick Ricketts were not enough troubled to opponents of Duquesne University during the basketball season, the talented brother act is back to worry foes of the Dukes in baseball.  Dick, an All American in basketball, is good enough on the diamond that most of the teams in the major leagues have an eye on him.  He pitches and plays first base.  Brother Dave is a talented catcher. - Harris Photo."
